backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a telemedicine platform backend with patient, appointment, and consultation session management, plus user profiles and role-based access control using authorization and blob-storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of four main features: dashboard layout, design styling, healthcare UI components, and telemedicine consultation interface with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing React components, pages, hooks, and styling for the telemedicine platform UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS global styles with OKLCH-based color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark modes with healthcare-themed color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component with TanStack Router setup, Internet Identity authentication flow, profile setup modal, and route definitions for dashboard, patients, appointments, and consultation pages.
frontend/src/components/appointments/App: Appointment card component displaying date, time, patient info, reason, and action buttons for starting consultations or deleting appointments with confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/consultation/Con: Consultation control panel with toggle buttons for video, audio, call end, and calendar scheduling during telemedicine sessions.
React component for managing consultation notes, prescriptions, and follow-up dates with save functionality using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/consultation/Vid: Placeholder UI component displaying a video consultation area with a gradient background and connection status indicator.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Main layout wrapper component that combines Header and Navigation with a responsive content area for dashboard pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Top navigation header displaying app branding, user profile with avatar, and logout functionality using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navigatio: Sidebar navigation component with links to Dashboard, Patients, and Appointments pages, plus footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/patients/Patient: Patient information card component with compact and full view modes, displaying patient details and delete functionality with confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, patients, appointments, and consultation sessions via the actor backend. Each hook handles actor availability checks and query cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom medical-themed color variables using OKLCH color space, including light and dark mode support. Defines utility classes for medical, health, accent, and success color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the DOM root.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentsPage.tsx: Displays and manages appointments with tabs for upcoming and past appointments, includes a dialog for creating new appointments with patient selection and datetime input. Uses appointment and patient query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ConsultationPage.tsx: Renders a consultation session page with video call placeholder, controls, and notes sections. Fetches session data by ID from route params and displays loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard displaying statistics cards, upcoming appointments, and recent patients with a hero banner. Aggregates data from patient and appointment queries.
frontend/src/pages/PatientsPage.tsx: Patient management page with search functionality and a dialog for adding new patients with name, age, and medical history fields. Displays filtered patient cards in a grid.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes (including medical/health themes), typography, container settings, animations, and design tokens using OKLCH color space.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking an AI-powered telemedicine platform with Motoko backend and React/TypeScript frontend, documenting existing healthcare UI features and pending backend data model requirements.
